text.section:
Sec. 12-5. Campaign contributions and expenditures.
Except as otherwise provided by the Home Rule Charter or by ordinance adopted by the Commission, the provisions of the election laws of the State of Florida regarding campaign contributions and expenditures shall apply to elections for the Office of Mayor of Miami-Dade County, Miami-Dade County Board of County Commissioners, Property Appraiser of Miami-Dade County and Miami-Dade County Community Councils.
